content: Hey friends! Would I be allowed to sit in on the weekly Warg meetings? I'd like to learn more and potentially get involved.

You're welcome to join. Are you interested in the SIG, which is the official meeting for the project and covers higher-level topics; the working group, which is a meeting of contributors about the implementation; or both?
Oh, that's a good question! I was conceptualizing these at the same level. I want to listen in on both at first. :-)
Sounds good, you can ping me your email address to be added to the WG and @Bailey Hayes to be added to the SIG.
